reviewText: Love DR Greger!!! Ive learn so much just from the couple of DVD's ive gotten of him. Certain things i won't waste my money on, and certain this i would go a day without after learning from him
The best as always! Dr Greger is always entertaining and always keeps my attention and makes me want to answer all the questions! Love love love!

Dr. Gregor's work is always helpful, and very informative. This DVD is no different. I visit this man's website frequently, and he never fails to impress me. This DVD has a year's worth of his videos, and is indexed, so it makes topics very accessible. I love it!
